eu_initiatives: We follow all the Tobacco Legislation which may affect us in the UK
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: We respond to any consultations in respect of tobacco legislation which will affect the UK
legal_status: Association for Specialist Tobacconists in the UK
goals__remit:
AITS looks after the interests of Specialist Tobacconists in the UK. It runs an annual exhibition for its members and keeps members up to date with legislation changes.  
 
AITS has been involved in discussions with the Government prior to legislative changes over the last 10 years to ensure the special case for Specialist Tobacconists is understood.
